title: Aubrey Plaza (Extended) | Debate & Switch
description:
Dr. Oz took a pecuilar stance on abortion right during his debate against John Fetterman in Pennsylvania last night, and another woman has shared her story of a secret relationship with Herschel Walker.  And one of our favorite guests, Aubrey Plaza, returns for a podcast exclusive extended interview to talk about her role in Season 2 of “The White Lotus,” which premieres this Sunday on HBO.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
